text: Vony navitʹ vidkladayutʹ aktsiyu BOZHYKH umov zerna ta domashnoyi khudoby, kazhuchy, "Tse aktsiya nalezhytʹ BOHU," z·hidno z yikhnimy pretenziyamy, "ta tse aktsiya nalezhytʹ nashym idolam." Ale, shcho buly vidkladeni dlya yikhnikh idoliv nikoly ne dosyahly BOHA, v toy chas, yak dolʹovi vony vidkladayutʹ dlya BOHA nezminno poyikhaly do yikhnikh idoliv. Neshchasnyy diysno yikhniy vyrok
